text: The 1962 Stanley Cup Finals was played between the defending champion Chicago Black Hawks and the Toronto Maple Leafs. The Maple Leafs were also in the Final in 1960. The Maple Leafs would win the best-of-seven series four games to two to win the Stanley Cup. This was their first win since 1951. == References == Category:Stanley Cup Finals Category:Toronto Maple Leafs Category:Chicago Blackhawks Category:1962 in ice hockey Category:1962 in the United States Category:1960s in Chicago Category:1960s in Canada
title: 1962 Stanley Cup Finals
